mechanics.condition: Player chooses to activate Indomitable (available uses remaining)
mechanics.outcome: Player rerolls the saving throw and must use the new result
Indomitable cannot be used again until a long rest (1 use per long rest)
Indomitable can be used twice between long rests
Indomitable can be used three times between long rests

description_text: Beginning at 9th level, you can reroll a saving throw that you fail. If you do so, you must use the new roll, and you can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest. You can use this feature twice between long rests starting at 13th level and three times between long rests starting at 17th level.
